people.name: Eddard "Ned" Stark
people.description: Lord of Winterfell - Warden of the North - Hand of the King - Married to Catelyn (Tully) Stark

people.name: Catelyn (Tully) Stark
people.description: Catelyn Stark is an honorable woman who always wants the best for her family. She stays true to the Tully words: Family, Duty, Honor.

people.name: Robb Stark
people.description: Son of Eddard and Catelyn Stark - Direwolf: Grey Wind

people.name: Sansa Stark
people.description: Daughter of Eddard and Catelyn Stark - Direwolf: Lady

people.name: Arya Stark
people.description: Daughter of Eddard and Catelyn Stark - Direwolf: Nymeria

people.name: Brandon "Bran" Stark
people.description: Son of Eddard and Catelyn Stark - Direwolf: Summer

people.name: Rickon Stark
people.description: Son of Eddard and Catelyn Stark - Direwolf: Shaggydog

people.name: Jon Snow
people.description: Bastard son of Eddard Stark - Steweard in the Night's Watch - Direwolf: Ghost

people.name: Benjen Stark
people.description: Brother of Eddard Stark - First ranger of the Night's Watch

people.name: Tywin Lannister
people.description: Lord of Casterly Rock - Warden of the West

people.name: Kevan Lannister
people.description: Kevan Lannister is Tywin Lannister's younger brother. Kevan accompanies Tywin in the battle in the Riverlands.

people.name: Cersei (Lannister) Baratheon
people.description: Married to King Robert Baratheon - Daughter of Tywin Lannister

people.name: Jaime Lannister
people.description: The Kingslayer - Knight of the Kingsgaurd - Son of Tywin Lannister

people.name: Tyrion Lannister
people.description: Son of Tywin Lannister - The Imp

people.name: Lancel Lannister
people.description: Lancel Lannister is the oldest son of Kevan Lannister, Tywin Lannister's younger brother.

people.name: Robert Baratheon
people.description: The first of his name - Lord of the Seven Kingdoms

people.name: Cersei (Lannister) Baratheon
people.description: Married to King Robert Baratheon - Daughter of Tywin Lannister

people.name: Joffrey Baratheon
people.description: Heir to the Iron Throne - Son of Robert and Cersei Baratheon

people.name: Myrcella Baratheon
people.description: Daughter of Robert and Cersei Baratheon

people.name: Tommen Baratheon
people.description: Son of Robert and Cersei Baratheon

people.name: Stannis Baratheon
people.description: Lord of Dragonstone - Master of Ships - Brother of Robert Baratheon

people.name: Renly Baratheon
people.description: Lord of Storm's End - Master of Laws - Brother of Robert Baratheon

people.name: Gendry
people.description: Gendry is a former blacksmith apprentice for master Tobho Mott

people.name: Daenerys Targaryen
people.description: Stormborn - Khaleesi of the Dothraki - The Unburnt - Mother of Dragons - Daughter of Aerys II Targaryen "The Mad King"

people.name: Viserys Targaryen
people.description: The Beggar King - Son of Aerys II Targaryen "The Mad King"

people.name: Maester Aemon
people.description: Maester Aemon, whose real name is Aemon Targaryen II, is a Maester who has served the Night's Watch for many years.

people.name: Balon Greyjoy
people.description: Lord Reaper of Pyke - Head of House Greyjoy

people.name: Theon Greyjoy
people.description: Ward of the Starks - Heir to the Iron Islands - Son of Balon Greyjoy

people.name: Yara Greyjoy
people.description: Ironborn - Son of Balon Greyjoy

people.name: Margaery Tyrell
people.description: Wife of Renly Baratheon - Sister of Loras Tyrell - Granddaughter of Olenna Tyrell

people.name: Loras Tyrell
people.description: Heir to Highgarden - Commander of the Kings Gaurd - Brother of Margaery Baratheon

people.name: Olenna Tyrell
people.description: Olenna Redwyne is the mother of Lord Mace Tyrell. She is a wizened, cunning old woman with a wicked wit and a sharp tongue

people.name: Catelyn (Tully) Stark
people.description: Married to Eddard Stark - Daughter of Hoster Tully

people.name: Lysa (Tully) Arryn
people.description: Widow of Jon Arryn - Daughter of Hoster Tully

people.name: Edmure Tully
people.description: Heir to Riverrun - Son of Hoster Tully

people.name: Brynden Tully
people.description: Lord of Riverrun - Head of House Tully - Brother of Hoster Tully
